title: Text font similar to Delicato
content:
I am always on the look for a nice text font similar to Delicato, which I love, but it's unfortunately above my means to purchase at this time. Any suggestions for a similar, more affordable alternative much appreciated.  
Thank you!
author: Meloncally

comments.content:
Mathew Carter designed a face for MS Windows 8.1 called Sitka which is very close to Delicato. Seems to be only distributed with the software.

If you need an entire family of fonts (roman, italic, bold, bold italic), you may not be able to find anything more economical than Delicato. Here are a few suggestions that may work, but some only if you need a few weights:

Aster comes very close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/aster/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/aster/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/aster/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-aster/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-aster/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-aster/")

Leksa Pro:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alexandra-korolkova/leksa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alexandra-korolkova/leksa/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alexandra-korolkova/leksa/")

Berling:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/berling/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/berling/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/berling/")

PT Serif Pro:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-serif-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-serif-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-serif-pro/")

You can also look at:

Iowan Old Style by John Downer (Bitstream)

Ones from DS Type

Aster from Elsner & Flake
